transcript: Yes, I am let go with me. I hate you and I loathe you. I can't believe I just finally realized how you are I am never marry you never never never never I would rather die into a mess

I am never marry you never never never never I would rather die into a mess

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Yes I am. Let go of me. I hate you and I loath you. God, I can't believe I just finally realized how you are. I am never marry you. Never. Never, never, never. I would rather die in torment.
